Sentencas: Oxide scale formation on metallic interconnects contributes to the overall degradation of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks.
Titulo: Ohmic resistance of nickel infiltrated chromium oxide scales in solid oxide fuel cell metallic interconnects

Sentencas: On the anode side, thermally grown oxide scale might contain additional nickel, nickel oxide, or nickel chromium spinel phases depending on the applied operation conditions.
Titulo: Ohmic resistance of nickel infiltrated chromium oxide scales in solid oxide fuel cell metallic interconnects

Sentencas: Ni originates from Ni-meshes, often applied as current collector, from Ni-containing anodes or from Ni-containing coatings.
Titulo: Ohmic resistance of nickel infiltrated chromium oxide scales in solid oxide fuel cell metallic interconnects

Sentencas: Ni particles released during thermo redox cycles from adjacent Ni-containing components might be interspersed into the oxide scale.
Titulo: Ohmic resistance of nickel infiltrated chromium oxide scales in solid oxide fuel cell metallic interconnects

Sentencas: This study aims at investigating the influence of Ni on the electrical conductivity of oxide scales.
Titulo: Ohmic resistance of nickel infiltrated chromium oxide scales in solid oxide fuel cell metallic interconnects

Sentencas: For this purpose pellets of Cr2O3 were mixed with different amounts of Ni and then investigated in-situ under both reducing and oxidizing gas atmospheres at 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Ohmic resistance of nickel infiltrated chromium oxide scales in solid oxide fuel cell metallic interconnects

Sentencas: The formed crystals were analyzed using X-ray diffraction, whereas the resulting microstructures were quantified using scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Ohmic resistance of nickel infiltrated chromium oxide scales in solid oxide fuel cell metallic interconnects

Sentencas: During oxidation Ni is converted into NiO, and the latter interacts with Cr2O3 to form a NiCr2O4 spinel phase.
Titulo: Ohmic resistance of nickel infiltrated chromium oxide scales in solid oxide fuel cell metallic interconnects

Sentencas: Subsequent exposure to reducing conditions leads to an almost instantaneous decomposition of NiCr2O4 spinel, resulting in finely dispersed elementary Ni.
Titulo: Ohmic resistance of nickel infiltrated chromium oxide scales in solid oxide fuel cell metallic interconnects

Sentencas: This rearrangement of Ni by spinel decomposition leads to a significant improvement of the electrical conductivity of the Cr2O3 pellets compared to their initial state.
Titulo: Ohmic resistance of nickel infiltrated chromium oxide scales in solid oxide fuel cell metallic interconnects
